lead_paragraph: GERSTEL--Joel. The American Parkinson Disease Association mourns the passing of Mr. Joel Gerstel, its former President and CEO who passionately served the organization and the Parkinson's community as a national board member and then as its Chief Staff leader for over 30 years. We send our love and condolences to his family on behalf of all the families he faithfully served. 1/3
